    ```go
    //path: /usr/local/go/src/runtime/mheap.go

    type mheap struct {
    	lock mutex
    	
    	// spans: mspansmspanpage
    	spans []*mspan

        // arena

    	central [67*2]struct {
    		mcentral mcentral
    		pad [sys.CacheLineSize - unsafe.Sizeof(mcentral{})%sys.CacheLineSize]byte
    	}
    }
    ```
